A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Funny\, epic\, and sage.  The Last Jedi is one of the most visually stunning\, surprising and emotional movie-going experiences I've had in a very long time.  It reinvigorates everything you loved about the original films while taking bold and fresh steps forward\, alternating intrepidly between fulfilling and challenging our expectations.  With a wonderfully diverse cast of actors all of whom are at the top of their game\, its spot-on and timely messaging\, and overwhelming cinematography\, this is a film made at once for our present and future moment - one that everyone should see and be absolutely floored by.
